channel.title: Things Owners Deal With
channel.description:
Ok so im just doing my thing, helping people.
When this one guy asks me "can i be a donator, even if i don't donate"
What kind of question is that?
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/21k09ag.jpg[/img]
Post your interesting, or odd encounters with people on your server(this is meant to be fun)
-Will

[quote=“Opium10, post:21, topic:350122”]Hmm, have a guess who made the syiPkPker, yes it was ry60003333.[/quote]i think everyone knows that -.-

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

lesterknome:

one of my player back in the day (07) logged on my server with the name of skypker (or whatever) threatening to hack me if i didn’t give him admin. I ip banned him only to find he was one of my moderators. (True story)

Lol, I’ve seen that happen a bunch.

@TOPIC - Truthfully, this will always happen when it comes to games. Someone wants to scare you into getting what they want. Except, with RSPS, you typically will never get someone who knows what they are doing, so you don’t need to worry.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

ya dude i used to always get threatened by kids that tell me there gonna hack me, after i make fun of them for failing to syi, hack and what nonsense… i just make fun of them for using google tutorials on how to hack XD

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

Syipkpker being successful is a result of poor programming methods. I never had to implement a ‘fix’ for it. I’ve always had a decent way of handling connections which made it impossible to use that crappy program.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

razami:

Dude running server isnt easy you have to encounter many problems about syipkpker and alot spammers and hackers.

Mostly all the servers today have anti SYI, so that’s not really a problem. Spammers? Easy to fix. Hackers? 11 year olds that don’t know anything, and are trying to scare you.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

razami:

Dude running server isnt easy you have to encounter many problems about syipkpker and alot spammers and hackers.

I can fix all of that pretty easy, use an arraylist to stop spammers and syipkpker, and don’t make commands and other shitty name based codes that could make you have to shut your server down.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

I got asked if the player could be admin. When I refused he told me he was going to crash the server and hack me. He then proceeded to use Syipkpker and failed miserably.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:11, topic:350122”]Another time

person1:“Hey owner person!”
person1:“DUDE YOU!!!”
Person2:“You suck at Java you I bet you didn’t even know this was in Java”
Person3:“LOL this is in C++ fags”
Person1:“YO give me owner I know how to code in C–”
Person4:“Dude this server sucks so much I can tell you had Jagex code it”
Person1:“I am owner guys give me 100k and I will give you mod when you log out”
Jmood123 logs in*
Person1:“Fail server fails”
Person2:“Hello I am the owner here give me 1m and I will make you owner”
Person5:“This server sucks”
Jmood123:“How about this you fucking ignorant fags”
Jmood123:"::ipbanall"
Jmood123:“What the fuck now you fucking fags now I am the fucking owner.”[/quote]

I lol’d.

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @ajs47951 ajs47951
item.description:
@ajs47951 wrote:

the one thing i hate it pep saying im going to hack you if you don’t onban my Acc and stuff like that. I mean do you not realize i have a log of your IP And port i know were your PC is i can just trace your ip and port scan you and hack Netbios and put in a virus that will delete your bios next time you restart your pc" its funny iv had to do this to 8 pep all ready i don’t like to do it and i don’t do it for fun only if i can tell the person is really trying to hack me

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

I get that alot…

Just yesterday, I had a spammer saying give this person mod or I will crash server. The guy who he was spamming to give admin too was online.

I later found out, this “guy” wanted his items so bad, he wanted to get him banned… XD

Funny what people do these days…

-Will

Read full topic

item.title: Things Owners Deal With
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

“can i be co owner i will get ur server popular”

me: no

“bye i quit u mean”

If I got a penny every time someone said that, I would be rich.

Read full topic
